content.en: Polypharmacy interventions: Researchers have explored various ways to reduce medication burden and inappropriate medication use in elderly patients. They have developed algorithms such as the Good Palliative-Geriatric Practice algorithm, the Potentially Inappropriate Medications (PIMs) Advisory Board, and the Medication Appropriateness Index (MAI) among others, to help manage polypharmacy and improve prescribing practices. These algorithms have shown promise in interventions and pharmacist interventions, leading to more appropriate medication use and potentially improving the lives of older people with polypharmacy.
content.da: Polyfarmaci-interventioner: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige måder at reducere medicinbyrden og uhensigtsmæssig medicinbrug hos ældre patienter. De har udviklet algoritmer som Good Palliative-Geriatric Practice algoritmen, Potentially Inappropriate Medications (PIMs) Advisory Board og Medication Appropriateness Index (MAI) blandt andre, for at hjælpe med at håndtere polyfarmaci og forbedre ordinationspraksis. Disse algoritmer har vist lovende resultater i interventioner og farmaceut-interventioner, hvilket fører til mere hensigtsmæssig medicinbrug og potentielt forbedrer livet for ældre mennesker med polyfarmaci.
